info.name: fo_120_verify_to_create_edit_pay_for_invoice
info.description:
### Testsuite : verify to create invoice and pay for this

###### Testcase:

1. Authen
    
    1. Login => get token
        
    2. Verify token => get business_id
        
    3. Get current business => get more info
        
    4. Get business config => get is_pre_tax
        
2. Get data
    
    1. Get list client
        
    2. Get list transaction
        
    3. Get list va / get list master account (BIDV only)
        
    4. Get list payment method
        
    5. Get list tax
        
3. Create invoice
    
    1. Check invoice detail
        
4. Edit invoice
    
    1. Check invoice detail
        
5. Create payment for invoice
    
6. Hook pay for invoice
    
    1. Check invoice detail
        
    2. Check transaction
        

###### Note:
